transactionDate.description: The date and time when the transaction occurred.

description.description: A textual description of the transaction (e.g., 'Starbucks - $12.50').

amount.description: The monetary amount of the transaction.

categoryId.description: Reference to the Category. (Relationship: Category 1:N Transaction)

userProfileId.description: Reference to the UserProfile. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Transaction)

confidenceScore.description: Confidence score assigned to the transaction categorization.

explanation.description: Explanation of the transaction classification, potentially generated by XAI.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category for financial transactions (e.g., 'Dining', 'Fuel', 'Shopping').

rules.description: JSON containing fuzzy-matching or keyword-based rules.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. The `userId` parameter is the Firebase Authentication UID.

/categories/{categoryId}.description: Stores transaction categories. Access control for creation/modification may rely on a separate admin role collection.

/users/{userId}/transactions/{transactio.description: Stores financial transactions for a specific user. Path-based ownership ensures only the authenticated user can read/write their own transactions.
